title: Managing Your Money - Why Retirees Should Rethink the 4% Rule
description: Reshma Kapadia, associate editor at Barron's, and David Blanchett, head of retirement research at PGIM DC Solutions, discuss why the 4% rule may not be good for retirees looking to tap their nest eggs and what may be a better strategy to make the most of their savings.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
